CRITICAL: One of the running circuit simulation threads crashed!
This should never happen and might result in malfunction of the simulation algorithms!
The load will be destributed to the other available threads if any remain!

circuit_viewer.title: Hierarchical circuit view
circuit_options.title: Circuit options
circuit_options.circuit_mode.title: Circuit behavior
circuit_options.description:
Decribes the result of two opposing signals in the simulation.
High-Low Short (default) - Results in an short cut which causes a flickering wire and a warning.
Prefer High - Results in an high signal (basically like an OR gate)
Prefer Low - Results in an low signal (basically like an AND gate)
